tool_description:
Simple API to convert image format.
Supported image formats ['bmp', 'png', 'gif', 'jpeg', 'jpeg2000',
'webp', 'tiff']
name: Simple image converter
title: Simple image converter

api_list.name: url request
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-image-converter.p.rapidapi.com/convert/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-image-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-image-converter.p.rapidapi.com/convert/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
